welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pozos, Costa Rica, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, lush rainforests, and welcoming locals. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that this magical city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves flights to other destinations within Costa Rica.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for the first 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
